name: orpheus-monorepo
description: Monorepo workspace for the Orpheus project.

scripts.lint:js: pnpm -r --filter @orpheus/* exec -- prettier --check . && pnpm -r --filter @orpheus/* exec -- eslint --ext .js,.jsx,.ts,.tsx --no-error-on-unmatched-pattern .
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:js && pnpm run lint:cpp
